doc:
Ricardo Baroja https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ricardo_Baroja 0 Ricardo Baroja y Nessi (12 January 1871 – 19 December 1953) was a Spanish painter, writer and engraver. As an engraver, he is considered the successor of Francisco Goya. He was the brother of the novelist Pío Baroja and writer/ethnologist Carmen Baroja. Carmen was the mother of anthropologist Julio Caro Baroja and director/screenwriter Pío Caro Baroja. Ricardo_Baroja_y_Nessi ( 12_January_1871 – 19_December_1953 ) was a_Spanish_painter_,_writer_and_engraver . As an_engraver , he is_considered the_successor of Francisco_Goya . He was the_brother of the_novelist_Pío_Baroja and writer/ethnologist_Carmen_Baroja . Carmen was the_mother of anthropologist_Julio_Caro_Baroja and director/screenwriter_Pío_Caro_Baroja .
